title.subtitle: I'm an Industrial designer from Goa, India. I think of product form as a tactile interface that elevates user experience

education.heading: Bachelors of Architecture
education.content: Goa College of Architecture, Goa, India

work.heading: July 2018 - Present
work.content: Industrial Designer at Desmania Design Pvt. Ltd.

work.heading: June 2015 - June 2016
work.content: Assistant architect to Ketak Nachinolkar, Conservation  Architect, Goa

awards.heading: International Design Association Award TISDC 2018
awards.content: Taiwan International Student Design Competition 2018 · Taiwan Design Alliance ·  Awarded to project SQUATT in the product design category

awards.heading: Academic Excellence Award
awards.content: Award for academic performance in Semester II Masters of  Design · Design Programme · IIT Kanpur

awards.heading: Third Place in Industrial Design · Pune Design Festival 2018
awards.content: Third place for project 'Squatt', a squatting toilet, in the Industrial Design category  of the ADI Battle of Projects competition at the Pune Design Festival 2018 ·  Association of Designers of India

awards.heading: Academic Excellence Award
awards.content: Award for academic performance in Semester I Masters of  Design · Design Programme · IIT Kanpur

awards.heading: Special Mention · Honeywell Aerospace Design Challenge 2017
Lawrence Trophy
awards.content: Award for best architectural working drawings 3rd year B.Arch · Goa  College of Architecture

awards.heading: DD Sukhtankar trophy · 2nd place
awards.content: 2nd place Design Studio 2nd Year B.Arch · Goa College of Architecture

awards.heading: GCATA award for academic excellence
awards.content: Award for academic excellence in 1st Year B.Arch · Goa College of Architecture
